fields.title: Anomaly in {{metric}} on dataset {{datasetName}}{% if dimensionVal %} where {{dimension}} = {{dimensionVal}}{% endif %}
fields.bodyText: {% if dimensionVal %}For {{dimension}} = {{dimensionVal}} filter, {% endif %}{{metric}} was {{percent|floatformat:"0"}}% {{highOrLow}}er than the expected value on {{anomalyTimeISO}}.{% if contribution %} This filter's contribution to {{metric}} was {{contribution|floatformat:"1"}}% in the last 30 days.{% endif %}
fields.supportedVariables: granularity, datasetName, metric, dimension, dimensionVal, percent, contribution, anomalyTimeISO, highOrLow
